dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Secondary renewable materials; Bio-based materials; Biogenic materials
Secondary renewable materials; Bio-based materials; Biogenic materials
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Waste residue refers to secondary renewable, bio-based, or biogenic materials not intended as the primary outcome of industrial and commercial processes. It includes a variety of materials such as paper/cardboard, plastics, glass, aluminum, batteries, electronics, food, lawn materials, used oil, household hazardous waste, tires, metal, and miscellaneous items. Waste residue encompasses different types of waste like municipal solid waste, hazardous waste, industrial non-hazardous waste, agricultural and animal waste, medical waste, radioactive waste, construction and demolition debris, extraction and mining waste, oil and gas production waste, fossil fuel combustion waste, and sewage sludge.
废渣指的是不作为工业和商业流程主要成果的二次可再生、生物基或生物源材料。它包括各种材料，如纸/纸板、塑料、玻璃、铝、电池、电子产品、食品、草坪材料、废油、家庭有害废物、轮胎、金属和杂项物品。废渣包括不同类型的废物，如城市固体废物、危险废物、工业无害废物、农业和动物废物、医疗废物、放射性废物、建筑和拆除废料、采掘和采矿废物、石油和天然气生产废物、化石燃料燃烧废物以及污水污泥。
